PerfectNetExp.abs: lumps 块矿, lumpsucker 圆鳍鱼料, lumps 金丝鸟病
圆鳍鱼或者吸盘圆鳍鱼(Lumpsucker)是一种身材短小厚实的鱼类,通常生长在大西洋两岸的冷水海域,通过该种鱼的皮肤外附带着的类似于瘤的物体就可以清晰分辨它们。.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several very small lumpfishes

auth_sentence.content: Known as a lumpsucker, its pelvic fins are adapted to hold tight to rocks and weed in the most turbulent seas.
auth_sentence.res_content: Known as a lumpsucker, its pelvic fins are adapted to hold tight to rocks and weed in the most turbulent seas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Known as a lumpsucker, its pelvic fins are adapted to hold tight to rocks and weed in the most turbulent seas.
